ents":[]},"class":"forms","html":"BlockBasic","typenode":"vue","inputs":{"input_1":{"connections":[{"node":"a7cde6db-ef23-45e0-9123-ad5caffcd98a","input":"output_1"}]}},"outputs":{"output_1":{"connections":[]}},"pos_x":1625,"pos_y":561.7777777777778}}}}}
name: 教师评估
